message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. It's a game-changer in its field and I believe it can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its immense value to you, which we estimate to be $15000, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
